page.title: 10Penketh 1985
page.content: Penketh is a suburb on the outskirts of Warrington.People live here,they do not work here.It has a main road running through the centre which takes people to and from Warrington.During rush houra it is very busy.The river Mersey runs just past Penketh.Some people go sailing on the Mersey,but htere are whirlpools and you have to be careful.The disused St.Helens canal attracts a lot of fishermen.A railway passes by the canal taking coal to one of the largest power stations in England,Fiddlers Ferry power station.There is a small shopping centre.It has a supermarket,library,banks,estate agents,and other small shops.
